scripts.bundle-dts: npx dts-bundle --name @ts2asl/asl-lib --main ./lib/index.d.ts --out ../build/asl-lib-public.d.ts && cat build/asl-lib-private.d.ts build/asl-lib-public.d.ts > build/asl-lib.d.ts && ts-node build/wrapdts build/asl-lib.d.ts
scripts.build: npx tsc && npm run bundle-dts && cp ./build/asl-lib.ts ../convert/src/resources/
scripts.package: ts-node build/wrapdts build/asl-lib-public.d.ts && cp ./build/asl-lib-public.ts ../../../asl-editor-spike/src/ && cp ../../tools/asl-lib-generator/npm/dts/@aws-sdk/* ../../../asl-editor-spike/public/sdk-clients && cp ../../tools/asl-lib-generator/npm/data/client-names.json ../convert/src/resources
